page.title: 22Children's Homes
page.content:
Children's Homes

Year 6 Of Harbury School were asked about the type of house they lived in. 52% lived in semi-detached properties, with 35% living in detached houses. Two children lived in bungalows, two in terraces and one even lived in a windmill! This is the one in the middle of the village converted into a house some years ago.

42% had three bedrooms, and the same percentage had four bedrooms. Only 2 children lived in two-bedroomed accommodation whilst four luxuriated in five-bed properties.

Four houses only had one bathroom, whilst two boasted four bathrooms. Fifteen houses (48%) two bathrooms, and ten (32%) had 3 bathrooms.


Hannah King/Nigel Chapman
